TextView.android:text:
1 kg flower(any flower)
 1 bag of baking powder(2 TB)
 1 cup koko powder
 1 cup shugar
 3 L eggs
 2 TB vanlia extract
 3 cups of milk

put in a ball all of the dry ingredients
 then add slowly the wet.
 heat a pan on medium heat with butter.
 poor the mixtare.
 flip the pancake when u see bubbles in the top.
 then eat and enjoy : )
